title: If I was eligible for end of season rewards yesterday at end of season, but not eligible today...
body:
Can I still get the reward? I was honor level 5 yesterday, today I am honor level 1 for reasons I don;t want to talk about.
I was eligible yesterday before the cutoff time. Today I am not eligible anymore as of 1 hour ago.

replies.body:
~~That's one I'd probably take up with support. It depends on when they do honour checks for rewards I suppose, if it's at redemption or season end.~~

~~https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new~~

>If you’ve received a chat restriction only this past season, and are Honor 0 or 1, you will have an opportunity to climb back to Honor 2 by February 11, 2019. If you are Honor 2 at that time, you will get all the rewards you’ve rightfully earned with your blood, sweat and tears.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/TGYs0hwO-2018-end-of-season-rewards-and-honor

This is good and shows someone has a head on their shoulders its kind of stupid to gut the rewards of people who got chat restrictions just before the season ended where someone who got it earlier in the season had time to earn their way back, which takes a long time and a lot of games. Especially since chat restrictions happen only after one or two games after someone has a shit day at work.

O.O oh wow, 

but i'm guessing what they mean by that is if you have been suspended for anything you will not receive it.
Yeah players who are/were banned are still bound by the honour 2 on season end. This is only for players who have only received chat restrictions this season.
pretty sure you're not unless the patch was updated (because then the reward would already be handed out)
